attributes.action: Transmission of British citizenship by Descent from grand-parents
attributes.additional_details:
Under current legislation, British citizens can't transmit
british nationality to their grand Children.
To be British you need to be born here.
the place over prevail over blood.
We should reenforce the right of blood for our children and grand children and preserve our British heritage.
It's an important matter that seems to worry no one.
Please support this petition and help us doing what is right.
I thank you in advance,

S.H.N.
a concerned British citizen
